name: Innovative Designs
overview:
Innovative Designs is a sole proprietorship company, established in the year 2009 with a vision to meet the exact requirements of clients. The company is involved in manufacturing and supplying a comprehensive range of Residential Furniture, Corporate Furniture and Modular Kitchen Furniture. The distinctive and creative designs of our range are highly acknowledged among the clients and in turns we are getting repeated orders from them.

Infrastructure: To meet the growing requirements of clients and accomplish their bulk orders, we have established a hi-tech infrastructural set-up at our premises. We have segregated our infrastructure into varied departments, in order to carry out all business operations in a streamlined manner.

Quality: Being a quality centric company, our foremost concern is towards offering best products in the market. Moreover, quality is considered to be the essential part of our company and is well reflected in the products we offer to our clients.

Our Team: Our company is supported by highly experienced and dexterous team of professionals, who contribute a lot in the success and growth of our organization. Their sheer dedication, hard work and indulgence into work have assisted us to catering to the upcoming demands of clients is best possible manner.
